question.title: Lazy loading in spring core with component scan
question.body:
Let’s say I have a bean A with @ Lazy and @Component(“A”) annotations defined. However my configuration class has @Componentscan(basePackages=“…..”) where lazyInit param is not mentioned(false apparently if not provided). Will the bean A be lazily loaded still or do I need to add lazyInit=true to componentscan for bean A to be lazily loaded. This is for Spring core application not spring boot

Expectation: we do not need to lazyInit value but without that beans will be lazily loaded
